name: Earth Zero
description:
Originally a 24 hour Game Jam project on the theme "Death is useful".

The concept is to build a Plague Inc style resource management and spreading game for quick fast paced sessions on a mobile device.

The player gathers resources and spreads a disease, the goal of the player is to maintain a toxic disease as long as they can before the immunity becomes high.

We were able to design and implement the features but missed out on the overall balance of it.

Design: Varun Raj K

Art: Amey Naik

Code: Parth Pandya
